Package edu.ucsb.cs56.projects.games.poker

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Card
    A class which represents a card from a standard 52 card deck
    CompareHands
    Class that Compares Hands between Players
    CompareHandsTest
    Test class for CompareHands, to test if winning hands are judged correctly
    Deck
    Class that represents a 52 card deck Every Card obtained from the deck must pass through this
    Hand
    Class that represents a hand of 2 Cards.
    Player
    Class that represents a poker player
    PokerChatClient  
    PokerChatServer  
    PokerGame
    Class that represents a Texas Holdem' Style Poker Game.
    PokerGameGui  
    PokerMain
    The Poker Game Main Page (Start-Up) screen
    TableCards
    Class that represents the 5 Cards on the Table
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    PokerGame.Step
    enum representing the game step
    PokerGame.Turn
    enum representing which player's turn it is
    PokerGame.Winner
    enum representing the game winner
